results.title: Defying Violence, Women Join in Protest Against the Taliban
results.abstract: In their latest demonstration, women in Kabul called for their rights to be respected. The protest was once again broken up by force, in a sign that the Taliban will not tolerate peaceful dissent in Afghanistan.
results.byline: By Jim Huylebroek, Dan Bilefsky and Marc Santora

results.abstract: As the country’s leader prepares for a likely third term, he is promising “common prosperity” to lift farmers and working families into the middle class.

results.title: In Global First, El Salvador Adopts Bitcoin as Currency
results.abstract: President Nayib Bukele has promoted the cryptocurrency as a path to financial freedom, but economic experts and many Salvadorans worry the move brings great risks.
